Race.SpecificTitle: PW Board of Commissioners -- 2% S&U - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Grant Economic Development District (the "District"), under applicable constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy a tax of two percent (2%) sales and use tax (the "Tax"), for ten (10) years, commencing January 1, 2014, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services within the District, exempting food, prescription drugs and non-essential items other than alcoholic beverages and tobacco products (an estimated $250,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying costs of collecting the Tax) to be dedicated and used for the following purposes (i) 50% for maintenance, improvement and support of infrastructure within the District and (ii) 50% for promotion and support of economic development within the District?
